subject: Science
question: Question: There are apparently two different notable mathematicians named Borel. For 10 points each. [10] The Heine-Borel Theorem says that a subspace has this property if and only if it is closed and bounded. This type of space has the property that picking an infinite number of points in them would get you arbitrarily close to any point.
